ItemTooltips.mekansm: Mekansm makes Pugna's pushing capabilities an even stronger affair with a great heal and armour donation to the Pugna organization.
ItemTooltips.dagon: Dagon works well with your Decrepify and helps the team finish off some heros. If you feel your team is not dealing the damage needed, consider Dagon.
ItemTooltips.necronomicon: This item works great to add further mana drain and damage when channeling your ultimate. We want this to further team's early-game pushing capabilities.
ItemTooltips.ultimate_scepter: At an incredible range, no cooldown and increased life/mana steal. Aghanim's makes an effort to kill Pugna a very tried affair. Stay far away, use Decrepify to protect yourself or cripple enemies, and start taking their soul!
ItemTooltips.shivas_guard: Shiva's Guard is great for enemies that get too close; also for keep Pugna alive and his enemies' within range for his Nether Blast.
ItemTooltips.ancient_janggo: For added chasing ability in case casting Nether Blast would not quite reach your foe.

AbilityTooltips.pugna_nether_blast: This ability has a large area-of-effect and works great on towers. Use it accordingly with Decrepify to really deal extensive damage.
AbilityTooltips.pugna_decrepify:
Leveling Decrepify only increases its duration. Keeping it at level 1 is sufficient for most of the game.

Decrepify works on structures to prevent physical attacks such as Tombstone from Undying and your own Nether Ward!
AbilityTooltips.pugna_nether_ward: Nether Ward should be used before every team fight, it has a great range so don't hesitate to hide it away from the main fight.
AbilityTooltips.pugna_life_drain:
Use this even if at full life to regain mana. With Aghanim's Scepter, you can be a real annoyance to key players in the game!

Use this on carries and allies to keep them healed at the cost of your own life (and to use Meka at a more crucial time)!
